Package com.jgonmor.store.service.sell

Interface ISellService

All Known Implementing Classes:
SellService
public interface ISellService
Sell Service Interface Contains methods to manage sells.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Juanma G. Morcillo

    • deleteSell

      Boolean deleteSell(Long id)
      Deletes a Sell by an id.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the Sell to be deleted.
      Returns:
      A Boolean indicating if the Sell was deleted successfully.
